    • Constructor Detail

      • NormUtil

        public NormUtil(double dataLow,
                double dataHigh)
        Construct the normalization utility. Default to normalization range of -1 to +1.
        Parameters:
        dataHigh - The high value for the input data.
        dataLow - The low value for the input data.

      • NormUtil

        public NormUtil(double dataLow,
                double dataHigh,
                double normalizedLow,
                double normalizedHigh)
        Construct the normalization utility, allow the normalization range to be specified.
        Parameters:
        dataHigh - The high value for the input data.
        dataLow - The low value for the input data.
        normalizedHigh - The high value for the normalized data.
        normalizedLow - The low value for the normalized data.

        Normalize x.
        Parameters:
        x - The value to be normalized.
        Returns:
        The result of the normalization.
